com.btmatthews.utils.monitor

Class ServerFactoryLocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.ServerFactoryLocator

  • public final class ServerFactoryLocator
extends Object
    This locator object is a singleton that is used to obtain the factory that will be used to create server objects that can be controlled by a monitor.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerFactoryLocator(Logger logger, ClassLoader classLoader)
      The constructor that scans the classpath and registers all available factory objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerFactory getFactory(String serverName)
      Lookup the factory identified by serverName.
      static ServerFactoryLocator getInstance(Logger logger)
      Get the singleton instance of the locator using the default class loader.
      static ServerFactoryLocator getInstance(Logger logger, ClassLoader classLoader)
      Get the singleton instance of the locator using the specified class loader.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerFactoryLocator

        public ServerFactoryLocator(Logger logger,
                    ClassLoader classLoader)
        The constructor that scans the classpath and registers all available factory objects.
        Parameters:
        logger - Used to report status and error messages.
        classLoader - The class loader used to scan the classpath for ServerFactory configurations.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ServerFactoryLocator getInstance(Logger logger)
        Get the singleton instance of the locator using the default class loader. If the singleton has not already been created it will be created and initialised as a side-effect.
        Parameters:
        logger - Used to report status and error messages.
        Returns:
        The singleton instance of the locator.

      • getInstance

        public static ServerFactoryLocator getInstance(Logger logger,
                               ClassLoader classLoader)
        Get the singleton instance of the locator using the specified class loader. If the singleton has not already been created it will be created and initialised as a side-effect.
        Parameters:
        logger - Used to report status and error messages.
        classLoader - The class loader used to scan the classpath for ServerFactory configurations.
        Returns:
        The singleton instance of the locator.

      • getFactory

        public ServerFactory getFactory(String serverName)
        Lookup the factory identified by serverName.
        Parameters:
        serverName - The server name.
        Returns:
        The factory that creates server objects identified by the server name.
